==Version 1.0.1==
Release Date: '''October 22, 2020'''. miHoYo released [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/56083 Patch Notes] for version 1.0.1 on the forums for a few additional changes after released but before [[Version 1.1]].

===Optimizations===
*Optimized the PC client and increased miHoYo Account security
*Increased the stability and security of our servers.

===Fixes===
*Fixed an issue where the Elemental Reaction "Shattering Ice" had a small chance to not properly stack with other Critical Hit-boosting effects.
*Fixed an issue where certain bushes would produce abnormal effects under specific circumstances.
